translation: Time to put you out of your misery.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Time to put you out of your misery.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Do me a favor and scream REAL GOOD!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Do me a favor and scream REAL GOOD!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Why did I leave Two's side in the first place?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Why did I leave Two's side in the first place?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Why did her mind decide to shatter like this?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Why did her mind decide to shatter like this?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I'm just a fool, so...how should I know?{#Name="Cent"}
source: I'm just a fool, so...how should I know?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: But I am gonna make it right.{#Name="Cent"}
source: But I am gonna make it right.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: My lady, I swear it... This time I shall give you everything.{#Name="Cent"}
source: My lady, I swear it... This time I shall give you everything.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Oh, Cent! Cent! Kill them all! Cent, kill them AAAAAALL!{#Name="Two"}
source: Oh, Cent! Cent! Kill them all! Cent, kill them AAAAAALL!{#Name="Two"}

translation: Why, Cent!? Why did you do that to Dito!?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Why, Cent!? Why did you do that to Dito!?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Because somehow I feel this{LF}was...destined to happen. {#Name="Cent"}
source: Because somehow I feel this{LF}was...destined to happen. {#Name="Cent"}

translation: Like I was born into this world{LF}just to be with her.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Like I was born into this world{LF}just to be with her.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I guess you couldn't escape{LF}your Intoner after all.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I guess you couldn't escape{LF}your Intoner after all.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Mikhail! Don't listen to Cent!{LF}Show him no mercy!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Mikhail! Don't listen to Cent!{LF}Show him no mercy!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: And yet he murdered Dito.{LF}Is this the action of a friend?{#Name="Decadus"}
source: And yet he murdered Dito.{LF}Is this the action of a friend?{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: This is really hard! I don't get it at all!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: This is really hard! I don't get it at all!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: なら、私に従え！　その臭い口を閉じてついてこい！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: なら、私に従え！　その臭い口を閉じてついてこい！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: How'd she summon an angel without a song?{#Name="Zero"}
source: How'd she summon an angel without a song?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Shut up and worry about yourself!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Shut up and worry about yourself!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I've got this damn flower. I'll be fine.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I've got this damn flower. I'll be fine.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: That's great... I'll...I'll try real hard...okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: That's great... I'll...I'll try real hard...okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Let's squash this asshole and{LF}get the hell out of here!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Let's squash this asshole and{LF}get the hell out of here!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Never mind me, what about you!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Never mind me, what about you!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Move it! The poison's gonna... You're gonna...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Move it! The poison's gonna... You're gonna...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Guess I tried a little too hard...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Guess I tried a little too hard...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: No! No, you have to reincarnate! Do it now!{#Name="Zero"}
source: No! No, you have to reincarnate! Do it now!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Don't you die on me, you asshole!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Don't you die on me, you asshole!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Don't you...Don't you DARE leave me alone again!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Don't you...Don't you DARE leave me alone again!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Why does this keep happening to me?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Why does this keep happening to me?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: By the power of my song,{#Name="Zero"}
source: By the power of my song,{#Name="Zero"}

translation: in exchange for the life of this dragon!{#Name="Zero"}
source: in exchange for the life of this dragon!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Gods of the east, goddesses of the west,{#Name="Zero"}
source: Gods of the east, goddesses of the west,{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I offer up the flame of my life{#Name="Zero"}
source: I offer up the flame of my life{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Grant him now the binding shackles...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Grant him now the binding shackles...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I want you to know...I'm glad we met.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I want you to know...I'm glad we met.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Whatcha doin', dummy? You gonna sleep all day or what?{#Name="Child Zero"}
source: Whatcha doin', dummy? You gonna sleep all day or what?{#Name="Child Zero"}

translation: Stamp out the root of all this madness.{#Name=" "}
source: Stamp out the root of all this madness.{#Name=" "}

translation: 飛行ができなくなりました。{#Name=" "}
source: 飛行ができなくなりました。{#Name=" "}

translation: 毒のせいで・・・うまく飛べなくなってきたよ・・・{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: 毒のせいで・・・うまく飛べなくなってきたよ・・・{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: がんばってくれ！相手も弱ってきてるぞ！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: がんばってくれ！相手も弱ってきてるぞ！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: The flower... The fog... The fog and the flower...{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: The flower... The fog... The fog and the flower...{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: The song is gone! Eee hee hee...{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: The song is gone! Eee hee hee...{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Hee hee ha ha ha...{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Hee hee ha ha ha...{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Ahhhh, my head... My heeeead! Huuurk!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Ahhhh, my head... My heeeead! Huuurk!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: It's hard to believe Lady Three is dead.{#Name="Octa"}
source: It's hard to believe Lady Three is dead.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Was she fighting with your sister?{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Was she fighting with your sister?{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I'll just have to find One and{LF}beat the truth out of her.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'll just have to find One and{LF}beat the truth out of her.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hee hee... Heeeeee hee ha ha ha ha haw!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Hee hee... Heeeeee hee ha ha ha ha haw!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: The forest... Lady Three's forest...{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: The forest... Lady Three's forest...{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Without the protection of Lady Three's song,{LF}their minds have shattered.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Without the protection of Lady Three's song,{LF}their minds have shattered.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Ha ha ha! That's so damn sad... I LOVE it!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ha ha ha! That's so damn sad... I LOVE it!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: By utilizing the reprogramming function of the flower,{#Name="Accord"}
source: By utilizing the reprogramming function of the flower,{#Name="Accord"}

translation: the singularity known as Zero has created a new concept known as a pact.{#Name="Accord"}
source: the singularity known as Zero has created a new concept known as a pact.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: I do not know how this will affect the future.{#Name="Accord"}
source: I do not know how this will affect the future.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: However, I will continue to observe events as they unfold.{#Name="Accord"}
source: However, I will continue to observe events as they unfold.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: If we don't get outta here soon, we're in trouble...{#Name="Zero"}
source: If we don't get outta here soon, we're in trouble...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Shit! We're running out of time!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Shit! We're running out of time!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Uuurgh... I think I'm poisoned... I can't...fly...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Uuurgh... I think I'm poisoned... I can't...fly...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: He's vulnerable after he spits that poison...{#Name="Zero"}
source: He's vulnerable after he spits that poison...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Wait until he's open, then let loose!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Wait until he's open, then let loose!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Get out of the way when he's firing that junk!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Get out of the way when he's firing that junk!{#Name="Zero"}
